column6: 2015 at his residence. james was preceded in death by his father
column9: connie powell. survivors include his wife
column10: debbie rene powell of chatsworth; a son
column11: james ronald powell of chatsworth; his mother
column23: and cousins also survive. funeral services will be 2. 00 p. m. monday june 15th in the chapel of peeples funeral home with the rev. jackie martin officiating. the family will receive friends at the funeral home on monday june 15th from 11. 00 a. m. until 2. 00 p. m. in lieu of flowers
column24: donations may be made towards his final expenses. peeples funeral home & crematory of chatsworth is in charge of the funeral services for mr. james powell.
